artist: Photographer: David McDermott; Photographer: Peter McGough
creditline: Gift of Fay Gallus and Richard Sweet
description: printed in blue; image of four shelves with rows of top hats and bowler hats; received matted
inscription: LLC in pencil: 2 | LRC in pencil: PX810.89.29 | on back below stamp in pencil: ok for sale / Peter McGough
markings: on back stamped in black: COPYRIGHT MESSERS McDERMOTT & McGOUGH / THIS PHOTOGRAPH IS NOT INTENDED FOR (previous crossed out in pencil) / SALE OR EXCHANGE, ALL INQUIRIES / MUST BE DIRECTED TO THE ARTISTS. | on back in pencil: AP 3/3
signed: on back in pencil: 1907 Hat Ambrey. McDermott & McGough
text: Having worked closely with the Department of Photography and New Media’s longtime supporter and champion, Martin Weinstein, Fay Gallun and Richard Sweet have created a gift that speaks to our collection’s longstanding interest in social and cultural events and concerns. They provide evidence of the vast capacity of the medium to document, explore, and capture human experiences across the globe, and therefore comprise manifold possibilities for future audiences’ engagement with photographic works of art.
title: The Hat Ambrey, "1907"
